custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (LOWER(FragmentComposition.name) LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ( (FragmentEntry.head = [$TRUE$]) OR (FragmentEntry.headId = FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) ) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ( (FragmentEntry.head = [$TRUE$]) OR (FragmentEntry.headId = FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) ) AND (LOWER(FragmentEntry.name) LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId AS fragmentCompositionId, 0 AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentComposition.createDate AS createDate, FragmentComposition.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, FragmentComposition.name AS name FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId AS fragmentCompositionId, 0 AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentComposition.createDate AS createDate, FragmentComposition.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, FragmentComposition.name AS name FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (LOWER(FragmentComposition.name) LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT 0 AS fragmentCompositionId, FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentEntry.createDate AS createDate, FragmentEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, FragmentEntry.name AS name FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ( (FragmentEntry.head = [$TRUE$]) OR (FragmentEntry.headId = FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) ) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT 0 AS fragmentCompositionId, FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentEntry.createDate AS createDate, FragmentEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, FragmentEntry.name AS name FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ( (FragmentEntry.head = [$TRUE$]) OR (FragmentEntry.headId = FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) ) AND (LOWER(FragmentEntry.name) LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.classNameId, FragmentEntryLink.classPK FROM FragmentEntryLink WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) ) TEMP_TABLE

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntryLink INNER JOIN Layout ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = Layout.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = Layout.plid) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.plid) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ( SELECT Layout.plid FROM Layout LEFT JOIN LayoutPageTemplateEntry ON (Layout.plid = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) OR (Layout.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) WHERE LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid IS NULL ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON TEMP_TABLE.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (fragmentEntryId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntryLink INNER JOIN LayoutPageTemplateEntry ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.layoutPageTemplateEntryId) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND (LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.plid) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ( SELECT Layout.plid FROM LayoutPageTemplateEntry INNER JOIN Layout ON (Layout.plid = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) OR (Layout.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) WHERE LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ? ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON TEMP_TABLE.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?)
SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM FragmentEntryLink INNER JOIN FragmentEntry ON (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) AND (FragmentEntry.type_ = ?)

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM FragmentEntryLink WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM Layout INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = Layout.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = Layout.plid) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM ( SELECT Layout.plid FROM Layout LEFT JOIN LayoutPageTemplateEntry ON (Layout.plid = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) OR (Layout.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) WHERE LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid IS NULL ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON TEMP_TABLE.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (fragmentEntryId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM LayoutPageTemplateEntry INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.layoutPageTemplateEntryId) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND (LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM ( SELECT Layout.plid FROM LayoutPageTemplateEntry INNER JOIN Layout ON (Layout.plid = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) OR (Layout.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.plid) WHERE LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ? ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON TEMP_TABLE.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid
WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.plid = FragmentEntryLink.plid) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )
